Text.Value: Scandals! Vandals! Where to buy sandals! It's all here in the Baldur's Mouth Gazette!
In today's edition: Circus of the Last Days is struck by tragedy! Dribbles the Clown has been killed! Buy the Mouth for the inside track!
They've saved others and they'll save us too!
Darling duke discovered dead! City in disarray!
'Foul Hag Finally Destroyed - Victims Freed Too'! Read up on all the gory details before we sell out!
Murderers wandering our streets!
Danger! Danger! 'Evil Adventurers Put City in Danger'! What will the Flaming Fist do about it?
Breaking news! The Mouth said it first!
Today's copy lands with a BANG! The Steel Watch Foundry has been destroyed by sabotage!
Are you invited to Gortash's ceremony? If not, worry not - read all about the coronation of Baldur's Gate's first Archduke in today's issue!
Today: 'Murder at Lathander's Feet! Head Priest Killed!' Investigator Valeria is on the case!
Dangerous adventurers infiltrate the city and threaten civilians' safety!
Breaking news - Lord Gortash is dead! The Mouth said it first.
Pick up your Gazette today to find out how to stay safe.
Foul play afoot or tragic accident? The Baldur's Mouth investigates.
The printing block has never been so hot!
Stories! Stories! Get them right here!
Today's issue is smoking hot! Just like Ramazith's Tower! Find out why inside!
Keep up to date on the lord that's late - pick up your Gazette today!
Pick up a copy and read all about it!
Curious news: 'Strange Disturbance Spotted in Grey Harbour'! Speculations galore!
Breaking news! Hear all about it! The Mouth said it first!
Today's good news: 'Heroic Adventurers Arrive to Save City From Absolute'!
A Gazette a day keeps the ignorance away!
In today's papers - 'Steel Watchers Save City from Deep Gnome Assault'!
New heroes grace Baldur's Gate with their presence!

Synopsis: ADs for the newspaper criers in the Lower City, including near Steeps Strake, the Docks, Stormshore Tabernacle, and the square in front of Sorcerous Sundries.
